title: 2: S3E02 - "Ritual Regret" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors James Curnick, The Dead Canary, Jimmy Juliano, and Andrew Harmon, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about animatronic abominations, school lockdowns gone spooky, creeping creatures, and rituals gone wrong. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e02
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
